title: STUMPED Speech Practice Platform v1 Specification
content:
# STUMPED Speech Practice Platform v1

## Core Features

### Web Interface
- Text box to paste speech
- Start/Stop button
- Volume control

### AI Interruptions
- Random timing
- Three types:
  1. Questions
  2. Objections
  3. Distractions

### Basic Flow
1. User pastes speech text
2. Clicks Start
3. Begins speaking
4. AI interrupts occasionally
5. Session ends when speech is complete

## Technical Stack
- Simple React frontend
- Basic Node.js backend
- GPT for interruption generation

## V1 Limitations
- Text-only interruptions
- No recording/playback
- Single difficulty level
- No user accounts

## Future Additions
- Audio recording
- Multiple difficulty levels
- Performance tracking
- Custom scenarios
